DataElement.preferredName: Caregiver ENABLE Sessions Complete Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indication of whether a caregiver is willing to complete the ENABLE sessions.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Caregiver Complete ENABLE Session Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._A telehealth approach for palliative care targeted to rural patients with advanced cancer or other serious illnesses and their family caregivers._Time, period, or term devoted to some activity._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Caregiver; the primary person in charge of care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.

Concepts.definition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.

Property.preferredName: Complete ENABLE Session Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:A telehealth approach for palliative care targeted to rural patients with advanced cancer or other serious illnesses and their family caregivers.:Time, period, or term devoted to some activity.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
A telehealth approach for palliative care targeted to rural patients with advanced cancer or other serious illnesses and their family caregivers.
Time, period, or term devoted to some activity.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for URMC curation request. 11.5.2020 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
